title: Zellnerplus and HP DesignJet Eprint & Share | HP DesignJet T520 Review | HP
description:
HP Designjet T520 ePrinter

ZELLNERPLUS prints drawings on demand with the HP Designjet T520 ePrinter and HP Designjet ePrint & Share

Challenge
• ZELLNERPLUS wanted to find a more efficient alternative to outsourcing its printing work that would be reliable and could produce top-quality architectural drawings.
• ZELLNERPLUS needed an easy-to-operate printing technology to enhance its workflows.

Solution
• The intuitive HP Designjet T520 ePrinter offered ZELLNERPLUS fast printing speeds and excellent print quality. 
• With HP Designjet ePrint & Share, ZELLNERPLUS has the ability to access, view, and print files on the go -- offering the firm and its clients a tool to keep them all on the same page.

Results
• ZELLNERPLUS saves time by printing high-quality, professional architectural drawings in minutes at its office instead of hours compared with outsourcing.
• The team at ZELLNERPLUS learnt how to use the HP Designjet T520 ePrinter quickly and can efficiently navigate daily tasks.

"Now that I've seen how much the HP Designjet T520 ePrinter benefits our daily workflows, it would be hard to part with." -- Peter Zellner, Founding Principal, ZELLNERPLUS

Learn more about the HP Designjet T520 ePrinter beta tested by ZELLNERPLUS here: http://hp.tl/6003BxK1t
Learn more: http://hp.tl/6003BxK1t 

SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/2mGfXhF

SHOP NOW: http://store.hp.com/us/en/ 

About HP:
HP Inc. creates technology that makes life better for everyone everywhere — every person, every organization, and every community around the globe. Through our portfolio of printers, PCs, mobile devices, solutions, and services, we engineer experiences that amaze.
